shared.model.cards

Class Hand

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.cards.Hand

  • public class Hand
extends java.lang.Object
    The user's hand. Contains a deck of DevCards and a deck of ResourceCards.
    Author:
    thyer

      • canRemoveCard

        public boolean canRemoveCard(Card type)
        Determines whether a card can be removed from the hand
        Parameters:
        type - the type of card to be removed
        Returns:
        false if the card does not exist, otherwise true

      • removeCard

        public void removeCard(Card type)
                throws InvalidMoveException,
                       ModelException
        Removes a card of a given type from the hand
        Parameters:
        type - the type of card being removed
        Throws:
        InvalidMoveException - if there are no such cards in the hand
        ModelException - if the Card type was formatted incorrectly
